events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported case has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a clear photo of the incorrect item that arrived.
We have reviewed your information and will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for confirming the refund timeline. I appreciate your prompt support and look forward to the resolution.
Your refund case is now closed. Please allow up to 5 business days for the amount to appear in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we will now close this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
